title: Mask On, Mask Off | Daily Best of April 19 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Passengers, pilots, and flight attendants cheer after the end of the federal mask mandate is announced, but the Biden administration is pushing for two more weeks of masking. Two weeks... where have we heard that before? Things have gotten so bad at the White House even the Easter Bunny is having to help struggling Joe Biden. In Shanghai 26 million people are still locked down even though 90% are vaccinated. And, Producer Adler's car breaks down and he tells the story of walking along a busy highway with a birthday cake in his hands, the police showing up, and accidentally burning himself with oil. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
